text: I studied AI Engineering at Masterschool, focusing on Generative AI and Large Language Models LLMs. The program gave me hands‑on experience building production‑grade AI systems—I worked on scalable applications using Python, FastAPI, and Pydantic, developed RAG pipelines with LangChain, LangGraph, and vector databases like FAISS and Chroma, implemented autonomous agent systems with AutoGen, and applied NLP techniques using Hugging Face Transformers for tasks like semantic search, classification, and summarization.
